title: Glycemic variability and mortality in patients with aortic diseases: A multicenter retrospective cohort study
details: S Tang, Z Zhang, Y Cheng, L Zhang, Q Wang, C Wang - PLOS ONE, 2025
abstract: Background The influence of glycemic variability (GV), defined as blood glucose fluctuations, on short-term mortality in patients with aortic diseases, such as aneurysms and dissections, remains understudied. This study evaluates the …
